Purpose: To measure cadmium and creatinine levels in random urine samples and calculate the cadmium/creatinine ratio for assessing cadmium exposure, especially in occupational health monitoring.
Container: Clean, plastic, chemically resistant container without preservative
Equipment: Atomic Absorption Spectrophotometer (AAS) with graphite furnace or Inductively Coupled Plasma Mass Spectrometer (ICP-MS); creatinine analyzer
